StartPage.guessTheLetterRule: The goal is to guess the word from partially revealed letters.
StartPage.timeLeftRule: More countdown time = more letters revealed.
StartPage.gatherPointsRule: If you guess the word, you earn as many points as there were hidden letters.
StartPage.noPointsRule: If you wait too long and reveal all the letters, you get no points.

Board.pressSpaceToStart: Press SPACE to start the game!
